lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I am in need to obtain $190,000 to save by bar & grill. It has been in opperation for the past 5 yrs, but now my baloon loan is coming due. the present lender (previous owner) will not refinance the loan, and wants to cash in the remaining balance of loan due. everything I am doing is for my son. so when he is older he can run the family business, or have sometpe of nest egg.
lender.occupational_info: this is a bar & grill that is open 7 days a week. 4 apartments located above, provide a place to live for 4 families. along with that, we are home to the local chapter of the Lions organization. This organization doesgreat things for the community and the fight to prevent blindness. we provide to halls for rentals, along with being the place for live entertainment

lender.name: Angkor
lender.loan_because: I serve Angkor.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I joined Kiva as an MBA student at Pepperdine University. The picture shows my dog, Jazz, who is 11 years old and almost blind. Isn't he cute?!?

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I love to support others and this is a wonderful way to support in an ongoing manner. "Recycle" the money
lender.occupational_info: I use hypnosis to help people be healthier and happier

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: This is one small thing I can do to help bring a sense of dignity to the lives of a few individuals less fortunate (and probably more ambitious!) than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I design books that teach people how to knit, crochet, weave, spin and make jewelry

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I identify with entrepreneurs trying to make it work with what they've got. Every person doing good in the world deserves a network of supporters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother. I have a small business sewing purses.

lender.name: jamie
lender.loan_because: The world is flat.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Shelli
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do what I can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a director that oversees an afterschool program (and day camp in the summer) for kids between the age of 5yrs and 12yrs old.

lender.name: Rick and Anita
lender.loan_because: We believe that in a small way we can be a part of a great difference in someone's life. We do this because it is right and we can.
lender.occupational_info: Rick brings improvements to government services to citizens. Anita teaches adults returning to school to receive an education that will help them improve their opportunities.

lender.name: Sophie
lender.occupational_info: I write about music and occasionally, more serious things.

lender.name: Anna
lender.occupational_info: I'm doing research about the reasons people want to look after the environment. I hope to be able to use the research to encourage more people to lower their impact on the environment.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Cicela
lender.occupational_info: Primarily a singer - jazz and opera. I play piano, guitar and violin as well. I'm so fortunate to have a gift I can share.
